original_text:
Nineveh summons her picked troops,
    yet they stumble on their way.
They dash to the city wall;
    the protective shield is put in place.
korean_text: 그가 그의 존귀한 자들을 생각해 내니 그들이 엎드러질 듯이 달려서 급히 성에 이르러 막을 것을 준비하도다

sentences.original_text: yet they stumble on their way
They dash to the city wall
the protective shield is put in place
